body:
Comment 2 by **samlecuyer**: 
I'm using cgo to write wrappers for the functions, but some of the functions I'm
wrapping take int arguments, which are #defines which I want to make available in go. 
Is there a preferred method of doing this?

I've successfully done this with form.h, as seen here:
https://gitorious.org/goform/goform/trees/master

If this isn't working because I'm systematically doing it wrong, I'd love to know.
